protocol.name: P-AFFY-12
text: This document describes Affymetrix recommended labeling protocols for use with GeneChip Exon Arrays.

protocol.name: P-AFFY-13
text: This document describes Affymetrix recommended hybridization protocols for use with GeneChip Exon Arrays.

protocol.text: Arabidopsis seedlings were grown on GM agar medium for 2-3 weeks in a controlled growth chamber. Then seedlings were harvested and treated with ABA or dehydration stress. Total RNA was extracted using Trizol reagent according to manufacturer's instructions (Invitrogen). (Parameters: Extracted product = total_RNA, Amplification = none)

Arabidopsis seedlings (wild type and srk2dei) were grown on GM medium for three weeks. Then they were exposed to 50 uM ABA solution for ABA treatment, or placed on petri dishes for dehydration stress. Each sample name mean as follows; Col-cont means wild type (no treatment). Col-ABA means wild type treated with ABA for 90 min. Col-DH means wild type under dehydration stress for 90 min. dei-cont means srk2dei mutant (no treatment). dei-ABA means srk2dei mutant treated with ABA for 90 min. dei-DH means srk2dei mutant under dehydration stress for 90 min.
